title: Creamy chicken and mushroon empanadas
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, finely chopped', '6 small mushrooms, sliced', '1 chicken stock cube', '2 chicken breast fillets, cooked and cubed', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '580g thick bechamel sauce', '4 tablespoons grated cheese of your choice', '12 empanada pastry discs']
